summary: This code seems to be a personal statement expressing frustration and lack of interest in engaging with more advanced concepts or people. It does not appear to relate to any specific programming task or function, and therefore, it cannot be properly commented on as code.

details.content: there's no time for bullshit. my capability of learning is reduced to limited level. i do not want to play no game on those high-level freaks.
